rows.stringify: $(identity.pronouns.singular) seeks to spread compassion and hope.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) seeks to spread knowledge and wisdom.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) seeks to spread humor and joy.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) seeks to teach people how to fight against evil.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) seeks to forgive and reform evil creatures.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) seeks to eradicate evil in all its forms.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) seeks to nurture $(identity.pronouns.possessive) community and help it grow.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) seeks to undo all of evil's misdeeds.
